title: anumanE marutan
sahitya:
anumanE marutan maganE unnai vaNangi varubavarkku arul tarum niraivE nI vIra


anupallavi

  ghana vEgamAi senru vanam sEr sItai ugandiDa kaNaiyAzhi Inda rAmadUtanE


caraNam    parama bhakatan nI parandAman padam paNiyum maNiyE 
pAdai teriyAd-uzhalbavarkkE shrI rAman aDi kATTum aDiyavarkkarasE
